body.ab: lo tsha ba na re rgya che ba mkhyen 3 nang du rgya chung ba sbyor ba chos sku 'du ste rgya mtsho'i nang du chu'i thigs pa bzhin no gsung ngo ||
dge bshes khyung rin chen grags na re 3 po spyi sbyor ba chos sku bye brag yin pa'i phyir ||

dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'bar na re 3 pa rang bzhin
sbyor ba chos sku gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi nang du gnas skabs 'dus te rig pa dang bde bsdug bzhin no || zer ba la mkhyen 3 gang mkhyen 3 tsaM mi skye med mngon summngon ‹3› gyis rtogs pa'i mkhyen 3 yin | dang po mi rigs te thams cad mkhyen‹mkhyen› pa nyid 3 gyi sgo nas ces bstod phyag gi sgor gsungs pa'i phyir ro ||

yang dge bshes ar na re bstod phyag gi yul nyungs skyon med de mkhyen 3 mtshon byed kyi chos suM bcus sbyor ba chos sku bsdus pa'i phyir ro zer ba yang ma yin te | chos suM bcu la bstod phyag byas pa med pa'i phyir ro ||

dge bshes 'bre na re 'dir smos yuM sras na rnaM par bzhag 'ga yin la bye brag du gzhi shes pa mtshan nyid pa dang nyan rang 'phags pa | laM shes mtshan nyid pa dang byang 'phags | rnaM mkhyen mtshan nyid pa dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 2 rim pa bzhin rnaM par 'jogbjogTentative emendation pa'i rgyu dang des bzhag pa'i sras yin no zhes zer ba mi rigs te |

kha 1'dul 'dzin dkar mo na re rnaM pa skye
med mngon suM du rtogs pa'o || zhes zer ba dang rnaM pa skye med du rtogs tsam mo ||

'bre sogs na re dran pa bcad shes yin te sngar tshogs laM du rigs shes kyis rtogs zin pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes gsung pa ni ma yin te| 'di ltar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i cha yod de mnyaM bzhag ma yin la| mnyaM bzhag la tshogs lam bcad shes ma yin pa'i phyir ro ||

kha 1 'bre shes rab 'bar na re sa dgu pa'i'i rjes thob sgoM laM zag bcas yin
te zag pa 'byung du rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i rkyen 2 snang yod pa'i phyir ro || sa dgu pa'i mnyaM bzhag bsgoM laM zag med yin te zag pa 'byung du mi rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i rkyen 2 snang med pa'i phyir ro || zer ba'ang mi 'thad de |

kha 1dan bag na re dbang swos 'gog
pa yin te phung po'i mthong spang ces mdo las bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni ma yin te lhag med thob par thal ba'i phyir ro ||

The manuscript reproduction is not very legible and most consonants are not legible. This excerpts mostly follows the reading of the BUDA etext for parts that are unclear. shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa | slob dpon dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa rgya gar kyi mkhan po bidya ka ra pra bha dang | zhu chen kyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las | slad kyi paNDita dpal go mi 'chi med la sogs pa dang | lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa ¦ 'grel pa don gsal ba zhes
bya ba tshig dang don legs par bshad pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi rgyan ces bya ba | lulung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ shag kya'i dge slong brtson 'grus rdo rje°o(n grus) °(d)oe° °°s nye bar sbyar ba × rdzogs s+h+yo ||
